member.name: DML_CONVOLUTION_MODE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify a mode for the DirectML convolution operator (as described by the structure).

member.name: DML_CONVOLUTION_MODE.DML_CONVOLUTION_MODE_CONVOLUTION
member.summary: Specifies the convolution mode. When used along with , this flips the filter along the height and width axes.

member.name: DML_CONVOLUTION_MODE.DML_CONVOLUTION_MODE_CROSS_CORRELATION
member.summary: Specifies the cross-correlation mode. If in doubt, use this mode—it is appropriate for the vast majority of machine learning (ML) model inference. When used along with , this flips the filter along the height and width axes.
